subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: After an opening-round six-over-par 78 at Augusta on Thursday, which put him nine shots out of the lead, Ernie Els may be spending another year waiting for the next Masters to begin.
snippet: After an opening-round six-over-par 78 at Augusta on Thursday, which put him nine shots out of the lead, Ernie Els may be spending another year waiting for the next Masters to begin.
